page.title: 08Industry In Wragby
page.content: {HOLMES' WOODYARD. { Holmes' woodyard is{one of the {biggest industries in Wragby,}but it started as a small business just making farm gates and other agricultural things.They have{been in {business for 151 years}but it has changed hands a few times.{44 people {work at Wragby,}but Holmes' also have {a warehouse at Southampton. Holmes' stock and saw woods from many different countries like Africa, Canada,South America and the Far East. They mostly{sell wood for furniture {and snooker tables,}but a small part of their work is still making {agricultural things.}They sell and use {20-30 sorts of wood}including mahogany,oak,ash,beech,lauan,green- heart and teak.Holmes'woodyard takes up 11 acres.
